name: Muncher Mouse
overview: You are not lucky ! Not only are you born as mouse but you also lost your chance to become a movie star, as did your cousines Speedy and Jerry! To survive, you became a robber and started to raid all the kitchens of the neighbourhood. Your goal : to eat everything you can, in anticipation of shortage. Unfortunately, the anti-mouse squad, composed of cats from your town, is watching and will not let a rodent compromise their quiet contentment before the warm fireplace! Will you be able to fill your belly? Will you end up as a meal for some predators? Take your fate into your own hands!
